title: this is  Home page
bestFrellancer: The Best Freelance Services for you & your business
ForlansoDesc: Forlanso is the Perfect freelance platform connecting Sellers & Buyers from across the world, with 0% commission and no pending payments.
get_maximum_value: Get maximum value at minimum cost
find_the_desc: Find the service you need using the search box above or via the categories
order_desc: Review service description and buyer ratings, then request to open a contact with the seller.
money_desc: Forlanso holds the funds you pay until the work is completed & approved by you
receive_desc: Contact the seller directly within Forlanso until receiving your complete order
